quote_first: "This clock right?" he asked the butler in the hall. "Yes, sir." The clock showed
quote_last: . "The clocks here have to be right, sir," the butler added with pride and a respectful humour, on the stairs.
title: Lord Raingo
author: Arnold Bennett

quote_first: He entered No. 10 for the first time, he who had sat on the Government benches for eight years and who had known the Prime Minister from youth up. "This clock right?" he asked the butler in the hall. "Yes, sir." The clock showed
quote_last: . "The clocks here have to be right, sir," the butler added with pride and a respectful humour, on the stairs.
